page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT, ENTERTAINMENT,
page.content: heavy lorries employs 6 full-time and many part time drivers. On the new industrial estate of the 7 available sites in existence for over a year only two are in use. Mr Lovett, cabin- et maker specialising in renovation of quality furniture and reproduction furniture; and the firm 'Cliplink'. {ENTERTAINMENT}invariably arranged by such organisations as the churches, the WI, British Legion, clubs, pubs, schools and interested individuals. Interest is engendered by inter-pub events. Indeed, much of social life is engendered by the publican. Whist drives tend to be popular as is the occasional tombola session. {EVENTS}The big event of the year which attracts relatives and many people who have left Chulmleigh to return for the week is Fair Week - an event in existence since 1253. Its functions
